personal.name: Harshit Tibrewal
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.summary: Passionate Full Stack Developer with 1.5 years of experience building scalable web applications. Specialized in creating elegant solutions to complex problems with modern technologies.

experience.description: Contributing to the development of Thanos, an automated testing and regression platform, by designing scalable backend systems and interactive UI dashboards to enhance efficiency, stability, and user experience in large-scale QA operations.
achievements: Reduced regression execution time by 80% (5 hrs â†’ 1 hr) by architecting a scalable backend model using Python and Oracle SQL for parallel API execution.
Built a React + Next.js UI framework enabling upload of 50+ test suites, automation of 100+ API calls, and visualization of test results through dynamic graphs.
Resolved 20+ onboarding issues, implementing optimized fixes that improved platform stability and reduced recurring defects by ~40%.

experience.description: Contributed to automation and optimization initiatives within the QA team by developing data-driven frameworks and intelligent clustering models to streamline regression testing and improve code efficiency.
achievements: Designed a Python + SQL Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG) to cluster 10,000+ test cases, grouping sequential flows (e.g., ABC, ABCD) while separating non-sequential ones (e.g., ABC, ACB), reducing redundancy by 30%.
Developed a fully automated regression suite using Selenium and Playwright, minimizing manual testing and saving approximately 6 hours per week, improving overall test coverage and efficiency.

experience.description: Contributed to the modernization of the company's web platform by migrating legacy architecture to a full-stack Next.js environment, focusing on performance optimization, scalability, and maintainable code structure.
achievements: Spearheaded the migration of the organization's core website to Next.js, leveraging ReactJS, TypeScript, MongoDB, and Node.js, resulting in a 40% reduction in render time and improved overall performance.

Led integration and migration initiatives, implemented reusable components, enforced code quality through reviews, and enhanced site responsiveness by 15%, delivering the project one week ahead of schedule.
Learned React, JavaScript, and CSS in a real-world environment

projects.title: ScanIt
projects.description: A modular QR code-based restaurant management system enabling real-time order tracking, group table ordering, and unified billing. Designed to streamline restaurant operations and reduce waiter dependency using real-time updates and role-based access control.

projects.title: StockSage
projects.description: A comprehensive trading and analytics platform integrating Upstox accounts and processing 15 years of historical data from AlphaVantage to predict future stock price trends. Features include dynamic charting, portfolio tracking, and data-driven insights for informed investment decisions.

projects.title: Chess Game
projects.description: An interactive online chess platform implementing move validation, checkmate detection, and robust state management to handle complex game logic and over 59 billion possible game states, delivering a smooth and engaging user experience.

achievements.description: Comprehensive certification covering React, Node.js, and MongoDB - mastering the MERN stack
